You do know that you can tax loss harvest a large amount, right? The 3k limit only applies to overages. For example, if someone realized 2 million in a year, they could tax loss harvest 1.5 million if they have that much unrealized from their other positions. Thus, reducing their taxable income to 500k instead of the 2 million.

Hey, the chinaus trade war is escalating, esp. depending on who gets elected in the US. Additionally, China has been getting cooked recently in its real estate sector. It tried to use exports to fix the problems it had but those didnt work largely due to US and US allies increasing tariffs. Now, its trying to use stimulus cost estimates of 1 trillion, which is their largest nominal stimulus ever... if this doesnt work for long enough, then who knows how dire the situation could become. Im just saying its a nonzero risk that one wouldnt bear in most other investments.

content.text:
Teledyne press release (NYSE:TDY): Q3 Non-GAAP EPS of $5.10 beats by $0.13.
Revenue of $1.44B (+2.9% Y/Y) beats by $20M.
Based on its current outlook, the company’s management believes that fourth quarter 2024 GAAP diluted earnings per share will be in the range of $4.27 to $4.41 and full year 2024 GAAP diluted earnings per share will be in the range of $17.28 to $17.42. The company’s management further believes that fourth quarter 2024 non-GAAP diluted earnings per share will be in the range of $5.13 to $5.23 vs $4.51 consensus and full year 2024 non-GAAP diluted earnings per share will be in the range of $19.35 to $19.45 vs $16.18 consensus
